metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for one of the crowd patrons in the crowd at Dribbles' show.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug Book > Act 3 > Wyrm's Crossing > Circus of the Last Days. Go through the circus and to the right - trigger the Dribbles fight (1,1,1,1 the scene). You can speak to this chatacter after.

0.speaker: Flimsy
0.text: Dribbles! He can't be dead! He can't.

1.speaker: Flimsy
1.text: This - this must be part of the show. Dribbles is going to pop up at any moment - you'll see.

2.speaker: Flimsy
2.text: This wasn't in the last show!
